description: VirtualMachineExportLink contains a list of volumes available for export, as well as the URLs to obtain these volumes

cert.description: Cert is the public CA certificate base64 encoded

manifests.description: Manifests is a list of available manifests for the export

items.description: VirtualMachineExportManifest contains the type and URL of the exported manifest

type.description: Type is the type of manifest returned

url.description: Url is the url of the endpoint that returns the manifest

volumes.description: Volumes is a list of available volumes to export

items.description: VirtualMachineExportVolume contains the name and available formats for the exported volume
VirtualMachineExportVolumeFormat contains the format type and URL to get the volume in that format

format.description: Format is the format of the image at the specified URL

url.description: Url is the url that contains the volume in the format specified

name.description: Name is the name of the exported volume
